title: Add worker verification badges, employer favorites, job templates, availability calendar, and job reminders

requirements.text: Create worker verification badge system with three milestone tiers: Bronze badge for 10 completed jobs, Silver badge for 50 completed jobs, and Gold badge for 100 completed jobs, calculating badge level based on completed job count from attendance records
acceptanceCriteria: Backend calculates badge tier (bronze/silver/gold) based on completed job count
Badge data is returned as part of worker profile queries
Badge tier updates automatically when job completion count increases

requirements.text: Display worker verification badges prominently on worker profile pages and in employer candidate lists, showing badge icon with tier color (bronze/copper, silver/gray, gold/yellow) and job completion count
acceptanceCriteria: Badge component displays appropriate icon and color for each tier
Badge shows on worker profile page near reliability score
Badge appears in employer job candidate review lists
Badge includes tooltip or label showing milestone achievement

requirements.text: Create employer favorites list system allowing employers to save preferred workers to a favorites collection, with ability to add workers from candidate lists or worker profiles and remove workers from favorites
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores favorited worker IDs per employer profile
API methods to add worker to favorites and remove from favorites
Query method to retrieve all favorited workers for an employer
Favorites list persists across sessions

requirements.text: Add favorites management interface in employer dashboard showing list of favorited workers with their profiles, reliability scores, and skills, with quick actions to view full profile, assign to job, or remove from favorites
acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated favorites page or section accessible from employer dashboard
Star/heart icon to add/remove workers from favorites in candidate lists
Favorites list displays worker cards with key information
Quick action buttons for hiring or removing favorites
Visual indicator showing which workers are already favorited

requirements.text: Implement job templates system allowing employers to save job posting configurations as reusable templates, storing skill requirements, wage amount, duration, shift timing, and job description
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores job templates per employer with template name
API methods to create template from existing job or from scratch
Query method to list all templates for an employer
Method to create new job posting from template
Method to update or delete templates

requirements.text: Add job templates management interface allowing employers to save current job postings as templates with custom names, view template library, and create new job postings from templates with one-click population of all fields
acceptanceCriteria: Save as template button on job creation form
Templates library page showing all saved templates with preview
Create from template action that pre-fills job posting form
Template name editing and deletion options
Visual confirmation when template is saved or used

requirements.text: Create worker availability calendar data model storing availability patterns per worker with day-level granularity, allowing workers to mark days as available or unavailable with optional time range specifications
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores availability calendar entries per worker
Each entry includes date, availability status, and optional time ranges
API methods to set availability for single or multiple dates
Query method to retrieve availability for date range
Availability data integrates with existing job matching logic

requirements.text: Build worker availability calendar interface with visual day/week/month views allowing workers to toggle availability for specific dates, see upcoming scheduled jobs, and view availability patterns at a glance
acceptanceCriteria: Calendar view accessible from worker dashboard or profile
Day, week, and month view toggles
Click to toggle availability for specific dates
Visual distinction between available, unavailable, and scheduled days
Employers can view worker availability calendars when reviewing candidates

requirements.text: Display worker availability calendars in employer candidate review interface showing which workers are available for the job dates, helping employers make informed hiring decisions based on scheduling compatibility
acceptanceCriteria: Mini calendar or availability indicator shown in candidate cards
Expandable calendar view showing worker availability for job duration
Availability status clearly marked (available/unavailable/partially available)
Filtering option to show only workers available for job dates

requirements.text: Create job reminders system generating notification records for workers about upcoming shifts within 24 hours, job confirmations when assigned to jobs, and important job updates or cancellations
acceptanceCriteria: Backend generates reminder records for jobs starting within 24 hours
Notification records created when workers are assigned to jobs
Notification records include type, message, timestamp, and read status
Query method to retrieve unread notifications per worker
Method to mark notifications as read

requirements.text: Build in-app notification center for workers displaying upcoming shift reminders, job confirmations, and important alerts with unread badge count, notification list with timestamps, and mark as read functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Notification bell icon in navigation with unread count badge
Dropdown or dedicated page showing notification list
Notifications display message, timestamp, and read/unread status
Click to mark notification as read
Clear visual design distinguishing different notification types
Reminders show for jobs starting within 24 hours

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture with all logic in main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Cannot implement push notifications or SMS - use in-app notification system only
Cannot implement external calendar integrations - build custom calendar interface
Preserve existing authentication and authorization patterns using Internet Identity
nonGoals: External calendar service integration (Google Calendar, Outlook)
Email or SMS notifications for reminders
Advanced scheduling algorithms or conflict resolution
Integration with external job template libraries

Silver badge icon illustration with silver/gray metallic appearance (badge-silver.dim_128x128.png)

Bell icon for notification center in minimal style (icon-notification.dim_64x64.png)
Calendar icon for availability feature in minimal style (icon-calendar.dim_64x64.png)
